talents.option1: +1 Bonus Armor per Culling Blade Stack
+10% Movement Speed per active Battle Hunger

abilities.desc: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.
abilities.name: Berserker's Call

abilities.desc: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. The damage is increased by a factor of Axe's armor. The enemy is also slowed as long as he's facing away from Axe.
abilities.name: Battle Hunger
abilities.notes: Destroying buildings will also remove the debuff.

abilities.desc: When attacked, Axe has a chance to perform a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.
abilities.name: Counter Helix
abilities.notes: Counter Helix triggers when the attack hits.

abilities.desc: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, dealing pure damage. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, Axe gains bonus armor permanently and all nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.
abilities.name: Culling Blade
abilities.notes: Culling Blade death cannot be prevented with other abilities like Shallow Grave.
